Actions.Name: Deep Call
Actions.Effect: The Arkitek may summon a height 1 terrain piece adjacent to its target, and the target must save or become branded.

Actions.Name: Reconfigure
Actions.Description: The Arkitek teleports any number of created terrain pieces in range 4 to any other free space in range 4. Characters standing on the terrain or trapped inside are also moved with them.

Actions.Name: Pillar of Iz
Actions.Description: The Arkitek summons a height 1 destructible terrain piece in range 5, a pylon, with 10 hp. Characters on the terrain when it's created are pushed up on top of it. The Pylon has aura 1. Inside the aura, relict characters have resistance.

Actions.Name: Entombment of Iz
Actions.Description: The Arkitek entombs a character in a magical sarcophagus. While inside, they take [D] piercing damage at the start of their turns, are winded+, immobile, and blinded, but can otherwise be targeted normally. The Sarcophagus is a height 1 terrain piece with 10 hp that is destructible. Attacks automatically hit and it is destroyed when it reaches 0. It has resistance to damage from the character inside it.
